name: The Maze (Amjad_Mohamed)
description:
you are locked in a maze and have to choose the right way to walk into by answering the IQ questions correctly , you can't fight only run and jump , try to avoid the skeletons to stay alive , good luck ! 

W,A,S,D to Move.

SHIFT to run .

SPACE to jump.

*you can skip the scenes and restart by pressing SPACE.
